actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to limit the size of the Conboy Lake National Wildlife Refuge in the State of Washington to certain lands acquired with the consent of the owners, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Excludes from the Conboy Lake National Wildlife Refuge, Washington, land acquired by the United States by condemnation for which the owner or owners from whom such property was acquired have paid to the Secretary of the Interior the amount, if any, of the compensation received from the United States for such property. Permits the Secretary, after the enactment of this Act, to acquire real property for addition to such Refuge only by land exchange to make the properties within such refuge contiguous.

titles.title: A bill to limit the size of the Conboy Lake National Wildlife Refuge in the State of Washington to certain lands acquired with the consent of the owners, and for other purposes.
